articles.description: Tuesday marked one of the first times Mahomes, a social media star, has been spotted in public since his arrest earlier this month as he appeared before the judge to request a modification to his bond.
articles.content:
Jackson Mahomes, younger brother of Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes, appeared in court Tuesday in relation to his arrest for aggravated sexual battery.
